description: seemingly well-designed, but on my system is crashes more often than not and recently started cpu-looping. Too bad.
summary: great concept, but crashes and loops

description: System Restore Utility alternative of Windows
summary: System Restore Utility alternative of Windows

description: I really like this and it's saved me a couple times already

I LOVE THIS! It has come to my rescue on numerous occasions. Timeshift makes backing up and restoring your system an absolute breeze! It is an invaluable addition to your Linux arsenal of system tools. Get it and begin using it today!
summary: InValuable! Very Similar to Apple's Time Machine

description: This is amazing software. It's simply amazing and works great. I still don't understand why it's not installed by default on all ubuntu os's by now!
I'm always installing Timeshift as part of my initial system setup now. I don't have to use it often, but it's that peace of mind that really makes my day.
summary: Part of my initial setup for every system

description: Easy to set-up using the simple wizard. Set it up and forget worrying about safety of your data.
Good idea but needs a lot of work. In the latest version if you try to restore you're gonna need to set up your system from scratch!
summary: Good idea but needs a lot of work

description: Backup diff's are huge! Boot backup option is not working well. My computer broken, I fix by other operation system(dual boot).

Excellent, simple-to-use software. This is great, if you're tweaking or setting up a new system. This has already got me out of trouble. Something I installed broke mySQL and I couldn't find a fix so I just rolled back with TimeShift.

I run this automatically and whenever I've had to restore my backups it works perfectly. I wouldn't recommend it for home directory backups although you can. This could result in CPU loops when certain files are constantly updated like your browser cache. But if you're careful to just backup your main personal folders and some dotfiles you have to have, you should be fine. I wouldn't have an installation without this program installed and backing up.
A big thanks to Timeshift, you just saved my system.
This is a must have for anyone! Especially if you don't want to have to reinstall everything again. Absolutely saved my bacon!
i wish i could use it
summary: wanted to try but didint even started

description: can undo those upgrades.
too much bugs, no clean restoration possible

Great tool!
Many thanks!

Installed and created first restore point, 16GB used for the backup.
Trying to view log file displays pop-up error logging is enabled, 3 times, then new window pops up an immediately closes.
Does not appear to do a partial restore, it's the whole snapshot or nothing.
Does not support cloud or network drives, must be physically attached and mounted on the same computer running the software.
Wait & see if I keep installed or delete it. Has the potential to use most of a disk for snapshots... Mine is 290GB, 262 free before 1st snapshot, 246GB after.
summary: Buggy - Nice concept, potential disk space hog

description:
excellent!
thank you
kann nur empfohlen werden, Systemfehler z.B. nach Aktualisierungen oder Eingriffen ins System können einfach zurückgenommen werden.

Leider rammelt es die Festplatte ohne Rücksicht auf Stabilität voll ohne Warnung ohne Gnade. Wenn man es dann starten möchte, um das Problem zu lösen, kommt "Timeshift läuft gerade..." als Fehlermeldung. Ich werd schon einen Weg finden, dieses trojanische Pferd wieder loszuwerden, aber sowas bin ich von OpenSource-Entwicklern nicht gewohnt. Finger WEG!

Cada día me enamoro más de el software libre, sinceramente tiene sus cosas, pero herramientas como esta no se consiguen tan fácil en sistemas operativos Windows, enserio que genial poder hacer parte de esta comunidad
Excelente aplicacion, me ha salvado un monton!!
Почему её нет по умолчанию в 19.04?
summary: Эта программа спасёт ваш зад от геморроя

description: Действительно,почему нет по умолчанию?
Бекап и восстановление , для экспериментов.Помнит согласно профилю настройки.

Использую её на Debian и Mint. Так называемые "снимки" занимают мало места. Выделил для них отдельный раздел на отдельном диске. Это застрахует от долгого восстановления системы с настройкой многих программ, которые вы вероятно подобрали для себя в Linux. Уже выручала!Рекомендую!
summary: Вернуться в прошлое вашей системы просто и без лишней суеты

description: great great great
